effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. User charges for one turn before attacking. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. User charges for one turn before attacking. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

short_effect.black_white: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

flavor_text.black_white: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.
